body_html: Indeed, it runs out of memory on my 970 too. You can try to lower the batch size, but it might become too slow. We're working on making TensorFlow more memory efficient but it will take a while. It does fit into 12GB, so you can run it on a Titan X / Black or Tesla K40 / K80, but these are quite expensive.

body: Indeed, it runs out of memory on my 970 too. You can try to lower the batch size,  but it might become too slow. We're working on making TensorFlow more memory efficient but it will take a while. It does fit into 12GB, so you can run it on a Titan X / Black or Tesla K40 / K80, but these are quite expensive.
